alert.note: Alert for Boulder; Larimer (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 4:11PM MDT until July 15 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Larimer County in north central Colorado... Northeastern Boulder County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 411 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Drake, or 16 miles southwest of Fort Collins, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cedar Cove around 415 PM MDT. Carter Lake around 425 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lyons and Berthoud. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
